meanings.definition: A type of mold that is commonly found on food and used in the production of antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: Penicilliums can be seen growing on old bread.
meanings.sent2: The penicilliums in the cheese give it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The penicilliums at the party were the only ones not invited!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like penicilliums in a damp cellar.
meanings.sent5: The penicilliums spread across the loaf of bread like a green carpet.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the genus name Penicillium, which includes various species of mold.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study different penicilliums to understand their properties.
meanings.sent2: There are many penicilliums that can be harmful if ingested.
meanings.sent3: The penicilliums in the garden had a family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The penicilliums in the forest danced in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The penicilliums in the petri dish multiplied rapidly under the microscope.
